transportAdvice: Busan has an extensive metro system that connects most major tourist areas, beaches, and neighborhoods, making it easy to get around without a car. Buses fill gaps between metro lines, taxis are widely available and metered, and many beach and harbor areas are pleasant to explore on foot.

weather.description: Cold and dry with occasional wind; the coldest month of the year but rarely sees snow.
Still cold but slightly milder than January, with crisp, mostly clear days.
Early spring brings warming temperatures and occasional breezy days; a pleasant time to visit.
Mild and comfortable with cherry blossoms in bloom; light rain showers become more frequent.
Warm and largely sunny, one of the best months to visit before summer humidity sets in.
The start of the rainy season brings heavy, frequent rainfall and rising humidity.
Hot, humid, and very wet; peak monsoon season with heavy downpours, but beaches are busy.
The hottest month with high humidity; beaches are at peak popularity despite the heat and occasional typhoon risk.
Monsoon eases and temperatures begin to drop; still warm and occasionally rainy but increasingly pleasant.
Crisp autumn weather with clear skies and comfortable temperatures; one of the best months to visit.
Cooling quickly with dry, clear days and beautiful autumn foliage in surrounding hills.
Cold and dry with a festive atmosphere; outdoor sightseeing requires warm layers.
